step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you bring your hands towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the position well. Ensure your elbows stay wide and avoid pulling your head forward.
You successfully reversed the motion. Be mindful of keeping your elbows and wrists aligned as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer when bringing your hands up. Continue to spread your elbows wide and hold steady to maximize the stretch.
